A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a godawful wretched movie. It gave me cancer and AIDS simultaneously. I have to question the integrity and honor of anyone who actually enjoyed this heinous film. It is a blight upon the eyes and an abomination upon the soul. Brooding and awkwardly humorous\, it's most egregious sin is being incessantly BORING. Don't drink the Kool-Aid\, its full of soy.
